full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 757 Filed 08/10/22 Page 46 of 49 2019 LC9VMAXT 1 (Witness excused) 2 MS. MODE: Your Honor, could I have just a moment to confer with the defense? 3 THE COURT: You may. 4 (Counsel conferred) 5 6 THE COURT: Members of the jury, you may put the folder back under your seats. 7 8 MS. COMEY: Your Honor with the defense's consent, we'd ask to be heard in the robing room please. 9 10 THE COURT: Okay. You anticipate an extended sidebar? 11 MS. COMEY: We just need to be in the robing room, your Honor. 12 13 THE COURT: Okay. Why don't I send the jury back to the jury room for a break and then -- 14 15 MS. MODE: Thank you, your Honor. 16 THE COURT: Yes, to the regular room. 17 (Jury not present) 18 THE COURT: All right. I'll hear you in the robing room. This is an extended discussion; 19 20 MS. MODE: I'm not sure, your Honor, but our joint preference would be to be heard in the robing room. 21 22 THE COURT: Okay. All right. 23 (Pages 2020 to 2024 SEALED) 24 (Continued on next page) 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00019170
